question: What nickname did CNN International give to Bursa due to its automotive industry?
asked_question_translated: Welke bijnaam gaf CNN International aan Bursa vanwege de auto-industrie?
answer: CNN International gaf Bursa de bijnaam "Detroit van Turkije" vanwege de auto-industrie.
answer_translated_eng: CNN International nicknamed Bursa the "Detroit of Turkey" because of its car industry.
